documenttitle.text: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: rhvm-appliance security, bug fix, and enhancement update

note.text: An update for rhvm-appliance is now available for Red Hat Virtualization 4 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.
note.title: Topic

note.text: The RHV-M Virtual Appliance automates the process of installing and configuring the Red Hat Virtualization Manager. The appliance is available to download as an OVA file from the Customer Portal.
note.title: Details

note.text: Paramiko version 2.4.1, 2.3.2, 2.2.3, 2.1.5, 2.0.8, 1.18.5, 1.17.6 contains a Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in SSH server that can result in RCE. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.
note.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/2974891

reference.Description: bz#1637263: CVE-2018-1000805 python-paramiko: Authentication bypass in auth_handler.py
